about_the_game:
Pick up where Breach: The Archangel Job left off. Will you continue your story fighting the Chicago Outfit and the newly arrived Cartels alongside your motley crew of international criminals, join the FBI and hunt down your former allies and close friends, or set out on your own to search for the truth behind your entire life?

Breach: Chicago War Zone is a thrilling [Word Count (cat * | grep -v "*comment" | wc -w)] word interactive crime novel by Michael Maxwell and Ben Luigi, where your choices control the story. It's entirely text-based—without graphics or sound effects—and fueled by the vast, unstoppable power of your imagination.

With the optional randomized dice system, no gameplay will ever be the same, and your skills are half of what you need. To survive this world, you'll also need luck.

  • Play as male, female, trans, or nonbinary; gay, straight, bisexual, or asexual.
  • Romance more than 18 characters with their own unique backgrounds and personalities.
  • Customize your player's appearance, personality, gear and weapons.
  • Plan and execute a huge bank heist as an Archangel.
  • Become Chicago's most wanted criminal or vigilante hero as an Archangel
  • Raid Gregory’s underground black market as an FBI agent.
  • Hunt down your former allies, close friends, and lovers as an FBI agent
  • Take down The Chicago Outfit and fight back against The Unity Cartel
  • Or claim independence, and uncover the truth behind your own history

Roll the dice—and survive the deadly consequences of your actions.

content_descriptors.notes: The game is a fictionalized depiction of gang warfare in Chicago and includes screens of brutality between the different groups.
